page.title: 064th Horley Cub Scouts.
page.content: There are{2 packs Goodman -Mondays {Harman -Tuesdays.30}boys per pack, most recruited from Beavers.The New Chums aged 8 learn Law/ Promise and become part of 'six',given coloured woggle. The weekly programme starts with 'Grand Howl', inspection then games and work for{arrows:}Bronze, Silver, Gold.Other badges can be won:Artist, Handyman, Collectors.Evening ends with 'Flagdown' and Prayer.Events outside Pack night include:Swimming, district events e.g. cross country, football, sports.Camping is a big part of Cub life: summer{camp,}district sixes. Boys gain more badges:explorer, camper,athlete and enjoy 'wide games' and camp fires. At 10.5 yrs boys join Scout Troup after trying it out gaining the 'Link Badge.'
